alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:17PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Broadwater, northeastern Madison, southeastern Jefferson and northern Gallatin Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 516 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms near Harrison and south of Bozeman moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Harrison, Bozeman Hot Springs, Gallatin Gateway, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Logan, Amsterdam, Four Corners, Trident, Church Hill, Willow Creek, Menard and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
